website_summaries.verdict: A king-size sleigh bed with a lovely metal frame that adds simple elegance to any bedroom at an affordable price point.
pros: Made of durable metal that holds up well as a main bed
Legs have slight bend to highlight the sleigh design
Frame has a textured black finish
cons: Has a somewhat rough finish, so the frame can collect dust
Some beds arrived with parts missing

customer_reviews.title: This bed went together easily. It is for our guest room and we ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed went together easily. It is for our guest room and we placed a Casper foundation and Casper Mattress on it. That all fit very well. As far as the quality of the bed, there were no missing parts and everything lined up properly for easy assembly. As I said it is for a guest room, so it does not need to be super duper sturdy. For the price paid, it is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Spoon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We really love this bed. A good value for the money for sure. The room is small so the style opens up the room and really looks great. The only thing is that it has some really sharp edges where the curves meet the the headboard so you need to be careful when touching that area with your fingers or bedding. Other than that, we love the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the simplicity
customer_reviews.text: very fast shipping,a small dent noted on foot rail , noticed after putting it together ,seller reimbursed a small amt of money and offered parts . I was too lazy to take apart and can live with it. bed is what I wanted simple and elegant. I would recommend this product .I feel confident customer satisfaction is a priority with amazon and their affiliates.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Picture looks much better and larger than actual bed does
customer_reviews.text: Picture looks much better and larger than actual bed does. Finish is also somewhat rough. Think it will end up being hard to clean-afraid dust will stick to it and not dust off easily... Not super expensive, but definitely not a substantial bed and not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Check the product when it arrives.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bed alot however when it was delivered there was no attachment on the rails for the footboard. I had to buy a separate attachment for the footboard. I never returned the rails because I was renovating a room and by the time I opened the box and set it up the warranty had expired. This was a dissappointment. Once it was set up properly it is a lovely bed.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! It is great quality and very sturdy. I was afraid it would be flimsy and cheap but NO! It is beautiful and really pretty. We were worried about the height of the headboard. We have a very deep pillow top mattress and the headboard still shows. Each one of the "bars" are wider than they appear in the photo. Each one is a little over an inch wide. Be sure to buy the frame. We had to buy an extra attachement for our existing frame to attach the footboard.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna N.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this bed
customer_reviews.text: We assembled this bed only to find that the side rails are five inches too long. This leaves us with a very large gap between the end of the mattress and boxspring and the footboard. I have tried to have this issue resolved, but the seller will not send us the parts to fix this issue. I am very dissapointed that our safety is not valued by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: What a solid piece of furniture and great price! No questioning here
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect with this bed but I must say that I was pleasantly surprised. What a solid piece of furniture and great price! No questioning here...Be confident in this purchase....it's great quality and very attractive! I've received lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: rlput

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy Bed
customer_reviews.text: I am always concerned with a metal bed that it will be flimsy but this is very very sturdy and pretty
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed, easy to assemble. There is a gap between the mattress and footboard, I saw a review stating that so it was no surprise.
customer_reviews.author: PViola

customer_reviews.title: fun bed
customer_reviews.text: I still admire the bed, and has been there 4 months now.
customer_reviews.author: N. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Nice wrought iron bed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect frame for what I wanted in my bedrooom at a great price!! Very easy to assemble. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Love it. Very sturdy, not cheap AT ALL. And I’m picky as all h$ll
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a nice product, but not what I wanted once I received it and looked at it
customer_reviews.author: luann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and it is a very sturdy bed. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headboard /Footboard sticks (curves) out to far.
customer_reviews.text: Bed set takes up a lot of room as the headboard and footboard really sticks(curves) out . Good quality just not ideal for small rooms
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kratzke

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Great bed frame. So perfect to put together. All the parts fit perfectly. I was very impressed. And it looks beautiful too!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Embrey

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this frame
customer_reviews.text: Imported garbage. Makes me question the other reviews. The package arrived damaged. As in - major damage. The headboard and footboard were bent severely. I was able to physically straighten them - but looking back, at that point I should have just returned it. The quality is poor. the welds are extremely poor quality. The slats are thin and flimsy. The photo is very misleading. For the price I expected a MUCH higher quality product in tearms of quality and finish. Extremely disappointed in the purchase. Strongly recommend looking at another manufacturer and a different bed frame. Still regretting not returning it as soon as I opened the box to see the poor craftmanship and packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Well Built & Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Well built, good looking, and sturdy bed frame. Went together easy enough and has held up very well after a year of use. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: H. B.

customer_reviews.title: product was ok thought it had bed rails with it ...
customer_reviews.text: product was ok thought it had bed rails with it do es hillsdale stock the ones to match this item. had to adapt bed rails from another company not easy
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Good bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed surprised me, a lot more solid and rugged than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Bob’s your uncle

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for my teenage daughter. Its a very nice bed and looks even better in person but unfortunately I purchased it without the rails so I had to buy then elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: kels

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Bed
customer_reviews.text: Bed was reasonably priced, east to set up and has worked great for us. Its looks great and seems very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Steven R Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Bed was very nice and unfortunately it was a little to big for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bed was very nice and unfortunately it was a little to big for our room. It went together easily without any issues. We wish we had the room for it! Amazon made it extremely easy to return, it could not have been any easier.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Henderson

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: bought this bed for my daughter and she loves it. it is sturdy and it looks great. it was pretty easy putting bed together.
customer_reviews.author: kitt227

customer_reviews.title: Looks like I spent a fortune
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these bed frames so far. They look very expensive and made very well. They have held up for the last 5 years. I have purchased the king, queen and full size.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fram
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our college sophomore in his first off-campus apartment. It took quite awhile to put together, but looks great. He definitely has the nicest bed of his group of four. It will last him through college and wherever he goes next. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nova5

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BED FOR A GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: This bed exceeded my hopes and expectations: (1) beautiful; (2) sturdy; (3) very easy to put together, even by myself and being super wimpy about such things; (4) arrived within a week in perfect condition; and, (5) staggeringly, was shipped to Wasilla, Alaska for free...Also a bonus, it's quiet - something friends from New Orleans cautioned me about with regard to metal beds. Couldn't be more satisfied by this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CLH409

customer_reviews.title: Absolute fast shipping and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked by how fast this showed up. Super fast delivery. It was easy to put together. And I absolutely love how it looks. It completes my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a king size bed forever! I'm so glad I went with this one. Easy to put together. Love the look.very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna A.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly disappointed with this bed. While the frame is black, the rails that connected the foot board and head board were gun metal gray. The foot board has knob like feet at the sides of the each frame, but the head board does not. The picture does a fine job of making this bed look incredibly beautiful but the reality is much different. Didn't have the assistance to assemble immediately and wish I had so I could have returned this frame. And the cost of $300+ adds insult to the injury. I am an Amazon faithful but wish they would revise the return policy to allow more time (than just 30 days) for a returns. Looking to sell this frame.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Ya

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product with great value for the money. Very sturdy and fairly easy to assemble with good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not to Happy
customer_reviews.text: The metal bed set has a lot of scratches on it and was put together before they were noticed. I would be much of a hassle to take the bed apart and send it back. So I fell stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bed, But...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bed, but though the ad says it is a BED, it is only a headboard and a footboard, something we did not find out until opening it and trying to set it up. You WILL have to purchase a bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: cbparis

customer_reviews.title: Black Sleigh Bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. It is strong and very nice. Looks great in the room all made up as well.
customer_reviews.author: L Cameron

customer_reviews.title: pretty and sturdy come together finally
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this bed since 2011 I keep a small can of matte finish black paint in the closet and touch up paint about once a year ( it takes me about 5 min ) other than that it is really low low maintenance get the additional $200 for the rails that are designed for it though because the ones you have at home do not accommodate it without alot of well work and trips to the hardware store which in the end are not worth the hassle I bought it because it looked antique and was masculine yet feminine at the same time Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The bed would look very nice in our bedroom the frame seems to be of very high quality. However, after four weeks we are still waiting to appreciate it in person.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

product_meta.title: Hillsdale Furniture 1655BQR Janis Metal Sleigh Bed Set with Rails, Queen, Textured Black
product_meta.description: Size:QueenA smartly scaled janis metal sleigh bed featuring strap spindles that wrap around the top rail. the side legs have a gentle bend to accent the sleigh design theme. set includes one headboard, one footboard, completely welded grills with 1-3/4-inch legs, 1-1/4-inch round rails, cast foot and 1-1/8-inch flat strap spindles. available in textured black color and queen size. headboard measures 62-inch width by 45-inch height and footboard measures 62-inch width by 28-inch height.
feature_bullets: A smartly scaled Janis metal sleigh bed featuring strap spindles that wrap around the top rail
The side legs have a gentle bend to accent the sleigh design theme
Set includes one headboard, one footboard, completely welded grills with 1-3/4-inch legs, 1-1/4-inch round rails
Available in textured black color and queen size
Headboard measures 62-inch width by 45-inch height and footboard measures 62-inch width by 28-inch height

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars59 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
